Description:
Exceptional family home on a fabulous 718m2 block
- Immaculate three bedroom family home beautifully presented
- A lovely 718m2 block with carport and workshop (5m x 10m)
- Master bedroom has direct access to the two-way bathroom
- Spacious kitchen with pantry adjoining a large separate lounge
- Ducted evaporative cooling, gas heating and solar power
- Undercover entertainment area, water tanks and fully landscaped yard
- Shutters on front windows, nicely painted throughout and extremely well maintained
- Double carport and garage/workshop. Very nice established garden
- Exceptionally good location close to all amenities and a few minutes drive to the new Hospital and Lake Weeroona
This beautifully presented home has been fastidiously maintained and presents exceptionally well. Simply move in, absolutely nothing to spend! A really nice yard for the family or grandchildren with a low maintenance garden. Being one of the best locations in Bendigo for families this home is ideal for the first home buyer or family.

Description:
Lovely old period home on a fabulous 787m2 block
- Lovely period residence with original features on a 787m2 block
- Offering three bedrooms, all good sized rooms
- Presents a great opportunity to restore this residence to its former glory
- Absolutely blue chip locale close to all services and the University
- 11'6"ceilings, leadlight, overmantle, grand entrance, huge potential
- Potential to restore the home to its former glory and show off the beautiful street appeal this home offers
- Gas heater and airconditioners for all seasons
- Single garage/workshop for vehicles
For those that are not aware Kennington is one of the most highly sought after areas in Bendigo and the locale of this home is no exception. Just a few minutes drive or walk to central Bendigo and the University make this a prime location and prime real estate. Opportunity presents to reside in and restore this home to its former glory, such an appealing home with such potential will create enormous interest. Please give Gavin a call for a private inspection on any day.

Description:
FEELS LIKE HOME!!
* Impeccably presented, spacious one-owner home.
* Four bedrooms, two bathrooms separate lounge & light-filled kitchen/living/dining areas opening to alfresco.
* Well-equipped kitchen, spotted gum timber floors, ducted heating/cooling, 12-panel solar system.
* Double garage with internal access.
* Side driveway for caravan/trailer etc.
* 6m x 9m shed/workshop/man cave.
This stylish, modern home built for the current owners by high quality boutique builder Sam McCaskill presents a free-flowing floor plan encompassing four bedrooms, two bathrooms, lounge and big open-plan living, dining and kitchen areas flooded with northern light.
Impeccably presented, it features a generous main suite incorporating his and hers walk-in robes and chic ensuite with twin vanity basins, walk-in shower and WC. while three more good-sized bedrooms, all with built-in robes are serviced by the family bathroom.
Living spaces include a separate lounge while the family, dining and kitchen areas shine with fabulous spotted gum timber floors, big windows and open to a covered alfresco.
The designer kitchen is equipped for gourmet cooks with up-to-the-minute appliances and a large, stone-topped island bench/breakfast bar, corner pantry and loads of pot drawers.
Added extras include ducted heating and cooling, full wall tiling to bathrooms, subtle, neutral décor, storage-rich laundry and 12-panel solar system to ease energy costs.
Outside, the home is embraced by fully landscaped gardens with secure fencing and a double auto garage with convenient internal access.
A side driveway with electronic gates creates a place to store the caravan, trailer etc and provides access to a 6m x 9m shed in the backyard it's the ideal workshop (or man cave) with concrete floor, power, mezzanine, wood-fired heater and WC. A rainwater tank and sprinkler system maintain the lawns and neat garden beds.
The property offers a relaxed lifestyle for families located in a streetscape of modern homes handy to Epsom Village, primary school, railway station, childcare and Bunnings Warehouse. Ideal for all ages and stages of life.

Description:
Luxury Country Living
When it comes to luxurious country living, it doesn't get much better than 39 Panorama Road, Lockwood South. This double story, fully renovated and scenically elevated home is truly outspoken.
The breathtaking experience starts on the bottom floor as you enter into a fully renovated open plan kitchen, dining and living area. Boasting floor to ceiling bay windows on the south-west side of the property that overlook the Lockwood South valleys. The views carry over to the master suite which boasts a walk-in-robe and access to the two-way bathroom. The bottom floor hosts another bedroom and a home office space both offering spectacular views externally.
Upstairs consists of two oversized bedrooms and the second bathroom. This area offers a variety of options. Currently being utilized as a kids retreat.
Externally, this remarkable property opens up to a grand undercover verandah offering stunning garden and valley panoramic views the outdoor entertaining space will not disappoint.
Paths through the Australian native gardens lead down the block past an established play space for the children to one of the two sheds available on the property. The bottom shed is not short of space, offering two separate entrances. One with ample space to store two cars, boats or caravans. Where the rear of the shed is completely transformed into apartment style living, complete with split system cooling & heating. This area provides opportunities for external living or even suitable to operate a small business from.
Every inch of this 3,972m2 block provides a feel of country luxury. The property exhibits an obvious attention to detail, with many improvements carried out over the years. The botanic style gardens are in picture perfect condition and easily one of Lockwood Souths most beautiful properties.
Now is your chance to call this extraordinary property home. Get in touch with Toby Gray 0468 708 785 or Matt Connolly 0419 369 844 to arrange a private viewing.

Description:
Prime Position, Prime Investment
Ease into central living with this position perfect unit.
Maintain an active lifestyle and take a walk to nearby Coles supermarket, Bendigo CBD or enjoy the fresh air strolling around nearby Lake Weeroona - this home allows true ease of living.
Set in a quiet street but central to some of Bendigo's most popular attractions this property is suited to a number of house hunters; whether it's adding to the investment portfolio to bring in an additional rental income or move right in and occupy for yourself as a first home buyer.
The open plan kitchen, meals and living area greets you as you step into the home offering a light and bright space with a wall gas furnace and split system allowing you to easily control your climate. Both bedrooms have built-in robes and is serviced by the main modern bathroom - equipped with all the essentials - a separate toilet and laundry with linen press.
Outside offers an inviting secure backyard with seating area and side gate pedestrian access. A lock up single garage and easy maintenance front yard makes up the rest of the outdoor features.
This property is currently leased at $290 per week to a fantastic tenant, adding to its appeal and investment potential.

Description:
First Home-Buyers - Investors - Opportunity Knocks. (Bonus Bungalow)
Rare to find such an opportunity at the entry level to this standard! This charming period home includes 3 large bedrooms, formal lounge with reverse cycle split air-conditioning, spacious kitchen/meals, bathroom, laundry and rear vestibule. The big bonus is that the property features a bungalow at the rear with its own bathroom, ideal for an elderly parent, dependant, or for the first home-buyer, a little extra income. Outside features a double carport, garden shed and fully enclosed yard. The property has had a lot of the hard work done, so with a little bit of finishing and flair, this home will really shine. Only minutes drive into the CBD, close to transport and shopping. Other considerations for use could be professional services ie; medical, business, accounting services (STCA). This one will not last. Be quick!

Description:
QUALITY & STYLE WITH SPACE FOR GROWING FAMILIES
Situated in this tightly held, prestigious pocket of the sought after Robin Hill Estate, this home is sure to impress with its size and family-friendly layout. More than equipped to cater to every family member with impressive ease, the floorplan introduces a relaxing lounge at the front of the house with direct access to the alfresco area, expansive open plan living meals, and an equally spacious rumpus/theatre, all complemented by an alfresco courtyard that leads out to the pool area. Adding to the easy liveability, the main bedroom with an ensuite and walk-in robe sit peacefully and privately at one end of the house, with the remaining three bedrooms enjoying their own space at the other. Side access to the rear of the property for caravan parking and room to build a good size shed.

Description:
Central Historic Living.
A generous corner block allotment in a central Bendigo location makes this three-bedroom two-bathroom home an enticing investment.
A large neat landscaped front yard leads to the sturdy brick home, stepping inside through the front formal entry you're greeted by the updated kitchen and dining area. Its spacious layout offers modern appliances, plenty of overhead cabinetry and natural light.
Peer down the hallway and along the polished timber flooring and you'll discover a large airy laundry with an abundance of storage and outside access, the light and bright main bathroom offering a large spa bath and all the essentials and two of the bedrooms with built-in robes.
Unique to this home is the spiral staircase accessed through the main living room with leads to the master suite. This space offers comfort and practicality with its own balcony, walk-in robe and three-piece ensuite.
The highlights continue in the secure backyard with its side yard vehicle access and carport, water tank and an additional separate room perfect for a teenagers retreat or guest bedroom. The room offers its own split system and ceiling fan.
A walk to nearby North Bendigo Recreation Reserve and close to Bendigo Corner Store Café, Catherin McAuley College, schools, daycares and Bendigo CBD the location is a standout.
Contact agent Jesse Forbes to arrange your inspection today.

Description:
Elsworth Park - Strathfieldsaye
Located in the heart of Strathfieldsaye, this peaceful estate is just a 5 minute drive from Bendigo and an even shorter drive to the Strathfieldsaye shopping complex which is equipped with a supermarket, hairdressers, doctors, pharmacist, post office and even a local Tavern! Extremely family friendly with two school options, plenty of sporting clubs and easy access to transport. With great prices ranging from $140,000 and up, all services are available, all titles have been issued and a copy of the covenants is available upon request, it offers a great mix for first home owners, families and retirees!!
Set on the corner of Camden Way and Pitt Pl, this 555m2 allotment offers plenty of scope for side access and/or a range of building styles depending on whether you want to take advantage of the 32m frontage to Camden Way or the 13m frontage to Pitt Place.

Description:
LIVE THE LUXE LIFESTYLE WITH 31 SQUARES, A BEAUTIFUL POOL AND LEVEL 1032m2 GARDEN
Here is a rare opportunity to buy a one-off custom built home in Strathfieldsaye's finest prestige pocket. Step inside and you will be greeted by stunning open plan kitchen, meals and living and an overall sense of design sophistication. The home offers an open plan kitchen and dining/living area which spills out onto the alfresco deck with stunning private pool area with an impressive custom-built timber door and hut. The sleek white kitchen features a huge walk in pantry, 900mm gas cooking, dishwasher and stone benches. The master bedroom is situated at the rear of the home and includes a WIR and luxurious ensuite, with walk in shower. There are three further double bedrooms all with walk in robes, a family bathroom and central laundry. There is access down the side of the house perfect for a caravan or boat, and a large rear enclosed yard. The home also offers ducted heating and cooling. This home has been thoughtfully designed and finished to a high standard. Be sure to inspect today!

295m²

Be amazed at Aspect!
Located in the ever-growing Family neighbourhood of Huntly, sits this five year old, neat as a pin, three bedroom, two bathroom, Metricon built home.
8 minutes to the train station and shopping center and most amenities.
This low maintenance, well sized property, allocated on an ideal 388 square metre block (approximately) is perfect for first home buyers, downsizers or investors.
Completed with generously sized bedrooms, open plan living space and plenty of quality fixtures and fittings, this home is sure to impress.
Currently leased to good tenants paying $350 each week. Lease ends Oct 2020 but they are happy to sign another year lease or negotiate a long term lease.
Don't miss out opportunity. Call Jacky 0468870611 for more details and organize an inspection.

Description:
Elwood Drive - Strathdale
Elwood Drive certainly offers the opportunity to live in one of Bendigo's most exclusive locations. Positioned off prestigious Harley Street you have a delightful natural bushland backdrop, two established shopping centres in Strathdale, schools, kindergarten and day care all within minutes. It's an established and sought-after location boasting established quality homes throughout. Each lot is ripe and ready for your home.
Lot 25 is one of the premium lots at 854sqm with a frontage of 11.54 located in the middle of the court. It is elevated and set amongst quality homes either side.

Description:
Fantastic Location
Clarendon Terrace - A modern two storey, terraced townhouse on offer in convenient inner city location opposite the Bendigos Hospital Precinct. Currently lease by an excellent tenant returning $340 per week until 28/10/2020.
Comprising of two bedrooms, master double bedroom upstairs with ensuite. Second bedroom downstairs serviced by its own bathroom. Impressive timber staircase reveals bright open plan kitchen/dining/living & study nook area which flows to sunny balcony on the upper level. Laundry has great storage space downstairs.
Secure double garage with remote (with extra storage) which is accessible from a sliding security gate entrance off Uley Street which is off Arnold Street.
There are 17 townhouses in the complex. Built in 2007 this townhouse makes an ideal choice - for the investor or owner occupier. So close to Bendigos CBD.

Description:
BUSHLAND RETREAT ACREAGE NEAR ALL AMENITIES
Positioned midway between the many amenities of Strathfieldsaye and Junortoun, this country family home is just minutes from secondary and primary schools, shops, eateries, medical practitioners and more. With a bus stop just down the road, the home sits on over nine acres and provides the perfect blend of bushland tranquility with city proximity.
Set back from the road amongst established natives, the weatherboard house sits at the end of a long, circular driveway. A brick paved entry leads to the front door and indoors, quality timber flooring can be found throughout the hallway and main living space. The property offers four bedrooms. All enjoy built-in robes and one is generously proportioned with access to the outdoors, meaning it could easily also serve as a rumpus room or additional living space. The master bedroom provides a spacious walk-in robe and French doors open out to the rear yard and bushland. A huge, luxurious ensuite has been recently updated and enjoys a dual vanity, floor-to-ceiling tiling, a freestanding bathtub, walk-in shower with two showerheads and large dual aspect windows overlooking the private native garden beyond.
A spacious open plan kitchen, living and dining space is full of natural light and the new kitchen provides a timeless, modern country décor with white timber cabinetry and timber benchtops along with modern, quality appliances and ample storage.
The living space and laundry both open out onto a spacious rear deck that runs across the back of the house perfect for outdoor living. A brick paved path and terrace run across the lawn area to a second alfresco space: a freestanding shelter with power. The fantastic entertaining spaces overlooks the fully fenced inground swimming pool. Beyond the main yard is a four-car shed, garden shed, acres of private native bushland and a dam. To the side of the house is a great home office or studio absolutely ideal for a creative.
Additional features include:
Ducted refrigerative cooling and ducted heating
Newly refurbished throughout with new bathroom, ensuite and kitchen
Modern kitchen appliances including integrated dishwasher, fully plumbed fridge and 900mm stove with five-burner gas cooktop
Spacious alfresco area (8m x 3.6m)
Large shed (4 car capacity, concrete flooring)
Garden shed (3m x 3m)
Inground swimming pool (salt chlorinated, 12m x 5m)
Dam
Separate studio (5m x 3m, split system heating and cooling, carpet tiles, exterior sensor lights)
This recently refurbished home, set amongst picturesque surrounds, is ideal for a buyer looking for a move-in ready property in the heart of bushland, that is still within easy reach of all amenities. Offering privacy, peace and tranquility, yet close to everything, this bushland retreat has plenty to offer.

Description:
THERE'S PRETTY MUCH EVERYTHING!!
This one is simply a fantastic home on a hard-to-find 5684m2 allotment in sought-after Old Maiden Gully. The property has been well cared for and constantly improved over time and is ripe for its new owners to just move in and enjoy everything on offer!
The home boasts four spacious bedrooms, three have large built-in-robes (the fourth could be a large study); the main suite boasts a walk-behind fitted robe, spacious en suite with separate toilet room and linen cupboard.
There are fantastic living options including a large lounge with feature bay window and embossed vinyl planking; a separate rumpus room and the central living hub which includes a huge kitchen, meals and living area.
The kitchen features stone benchtops, 900mm stainless hotplates & stainless elec. wall oven, double sink and loads of cabinetry. The living hub is tiled, there's a gas log heater, skylight and sliding doors leading outside.
The family bathroom and laundry are spacious and in very good order with plenty of extra storage here; there is ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling throughout and everything is immaculate inside.
For vehicles there is a large double auto-door garage with internal access; behind the house there is a huge 15m x 7m powered workshop with triple roller-doors, evaporative cooling and power; adjacent is a mechanics dream with an additional 10 x 7m workshop which boasts high-clearance door and ceiling and commercial quality vehicle hoist.
Outside is a huge covered alfresco space with exposed aggregate concrete and views towards the 10m x 4m in-ground salt chlorinated pool. There is extensive paving in the pool area, it is quite private & looks towards the huge rear yard.
The front yard has been carefully landscaped; planter boxes are out back and you will find plenty of space to manoeuvre a truck or larger vehicles at the rear of the two sheds. 22,500 litres of rainwater storage (with pump) and a 1.5kw of solar with a 3kw inverter.
This is hard to replicate and harder to replace - call the selling agents for more details.

Description:
ROOM FOR A CARAVAN OR BOAT
With interest rates at a record low, now is the time to invest in your future...
Showcasing flawless contemporary style, this recently completed north-facing, two-storey townhouse could be the new home you've been searching for. Whether you're on the hunt for a quality investment or an on-trend abode you'll be proud to own, it won't disappoint.
The boutique complex of six residences with minimal connectivity fosters a sense of community while maintaining seclusion and privacy.
Your new home features ground-level main bedroom with walk-in-robe and ensuite, separate powder room, big combined living, dining and kitchen area opening to a private courtyard with covered alfresco for entertaining or simply relaxing in style.
Whip up gourmet delights in the customised modern kitchen boasting stylish European designed gas/electric cooking appliances, dishwasher and high-gloss cabinetry including a 4-metre stone-topped peninsula bench with a waterfall end and chic pendant lighting overhead.
Upstairs is perfect for older children or guests with an additional living room, two generous bedrooms with robes, separate bathroom and another powder room
Added features include European laundry, large under-stair storage room/study nook, split-system air-conditioning, neutral décor and two-car remote garage with internal access, storage space and personal door to the fully-fenced rear yard.
Oozing superior quality and designed to embrace easy living, this is an ideal opportunity for those looking for a home in a convenient location where you can walk to the hospital precinct, Lake Weeroona, local eateries, public transport, sporting facilities and the CBD.
